parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The idempotency token to update in the queue. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID to update in the queue.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The display name of the queue to update.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the queue to update.

parameters.name: jobAttachmentSettings
parameters.description: The job attachment settings to update for the queue. The Amazon S3 bucket name. The root prefix.

parameters.name: jobRunAsUser
parameters.description: Update the jobs in the queue to run as a specified POSIX user. posix (dict) --- The user and group that the jobs in the queue run as. The name of the POSIX user. The name of the POSIX user's group. windows (dict) --- Identifies a Microsoft Windows user. The user. The password ARN for the Windows user. Specifies whether the job should run using the queue's system user or if the job should run using the worker agent system user.

nested_params.name: posix
nested_params.description: The user and group that the jobs in the queue run as.

nested_params.name: user
nested_params.description: The name of the POSIX user.

nested_params.name: group
nested_params.description: The name of the POSIX user's group.

nested_params.name: passwordArn
nested_params.description: The password ARN for the Windows user.

nested_params.name: runAs
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the job should run using the queue's system user or if the job should run using the worker agent system user.

parameters.name: requiredFileSystemLocationNamesToAdd
parameters.description: The required file system location names to add to the queue. (string) ---

parameters.name: requiredFileSystemLocationNamesToRemove
parameters.description: The required file system location names to remove from the queue. (string) ---

parameters.name: allowedStorageProfileIdsToAdd
parameters.description: The storage profile IDs to add. (string) ---

parameters.name: allowedStorageProfileIdsToRemove
parameters.description: The storage profile ID to remove. (string) ---
